titles.title: Transgender Military Service Reporting Act of 2019
To direct the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress a report on service waivers for transgender individuals, and for other purposes.
Transgender Military Service Reporting Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary:
Transgender Military Service Reporting Act of 2019
This bill requires the Department of Defense to report on (1) the number of transgender individuals applying for, receiving, or being denied a service waiver as a result of gender dysphoria, gender transition treatment, or any other related condition; and (2) the number of such individuals denied entry or separated from the Armed Forces as a result of such a condition.
